name: npm-build-boilerplate
description: A set of common build tasks written with npm scripts.

scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.icons: svgo -f src/images/icons && svgshelf src/images/icons/\*.svg dist/images/icons.svg -p icon-
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images

author: Damon Bauer <hello@damonbauer.me>
